scripts.new-day: mkdir -p "$YEAR" && cp template.js "$YEAR/day$DAY.js" && sed -i '' "s/const day = 0;/const day = $DAY;/" "$YEAR/day$DAY.js" && sed -i '' "s/const year = 2024;/const year = $YEAR;/" "$YEAR/day$DAY.js" && sed -i '' "s|require('./fetchData')|require('../fetchData')|" "$YEAR/day$DAY.js"
